Dear Cantera users,

I am also interested in simulating the piston of an in=
ternal
combustion engine using Cantera with Matlab. The issue about the
pis=
ton velocity in Matlab has been in this forum for quite sometime,
with appa=
rently no solution yet. Has anyone received/found the
solution for this par=
ticular problem? How would you construct a moving
piston Cantera reactor in=
 Matlab? I would appreciate any reply or help
on this issue. Thank you in a=
dvance for your kind attention and support.

Best Regards,
Peter Perez

---=
